name: Fandom Journey Apple //e Online Game
description:
This is Fandom  Journey, A Textual graphics Futuristic novel where you are a little kid and have to become bigger in post-Apocaliptic World.

Here The link to play click over it then click the power button listen music and press space! : https://archive.org/details/matteotrev_gmail_Fdm

If you want to download the file play it under windows in AppleWin emulator or under MAC OS under Virtual II emulator or under Linux in Linapple emulator.
